text: Suit is one of the two albums (along with Sweat) released in November 2004 by rapper Nelly. It debuted at number one on the Billboard 200 and was nominated for a Grammy. The album was certified triple platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The singles were "My Place," "Over and Over" and "'N' Dey Say". ==Track listing== Category:Nelly albums Category:2004 albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Suit (album)
